strings.ART74_CONTENT:
Video: Amir Tsarfati

Separation of Adam and Eve from Eden 1 3 24 24 Separation of Cain from his family and God 1 4 16 16 23 59 1 2 1 6 5 8 Separation of Abraham from his home and family 1 12 1 4 Separation Of Moses from Egypt 2 2 15 15 Separation of Israel from Egypt 2 12 31 32 2 33 14 17 Separation of the Levites from the people 2 32 25 26 Separation of the Jewish believers from traditional judaism 48 2 11 21 Separation of the Gentile believers from the pagan world 44 15 22 29 44 17 24 31 Walls of separation between the Jews and Gentiles were broken 49 2 14 14 48 3 26 29 Great separation of the church from the world 46 15 51 53 52 4 13 17 Separation at hand 45 12 1 2 45 13 11 13 45 8 22 25 Are you ready for the great separation?

You should know if you are ready!
Do you have oil in your lamp?
Therefore you will be encouraged.

52 5 19 19
strings.ART75_CONTENT:
We are born sinners with a sin nature! 62 3 4 4 60 2 25 25 51 1 21 23 26 18 20 20 We can\'t stop sinning and will sin until we die! 46 10 13 13 43 14 15 15 1 6 9 9 18 1 8 8 42 1 5 6 42 23 50 50 44 23 1 1 62 3 22 22 Jesus blood/righteousness covers our past, present and future sins! 62 3 7 8
About God:
62 1 7 7 All you have to do is accept what Jesus did for you or simply believe! 42 10 25 28 44 10 34 35 45 2 13 13 48 5 6 6 59 2 24 24 58 5 9 9 66 22 14 14 Once you are saved, you are always saved even if you sin! 58 10 26 26 48 5 19 21 66 21 8 8 26 18 24 24 59 4 7 10
strings.ART76_CONTENT:
Read this parable and learn how God, our loving Father, is waiting for us to repent and come to him.

Parable 42 15 11 32
strings.ART77_CONTENT:
Some Christians that I look on the internet, please, consult their podcasts.

Be vigilant, always check in the Bible.


Good podcast clients - AntennaPod (Android)
- Clementine (PC/Mac/Android)
- Itunes (Iphone/Mac)


How to import a podcast? - Copy an url by clicking on it
- Paste it in a podcast client
